overview: Flat hunting can become quite an experience when the house of your dreams is inhabited by two terribly seducing human beings. A music student goes to visit a flat to rent one of its rooms, and is welcomed by Renault and Pierre, who are roommates with benefits. Things start to spice up when the house's cat bites his hand, and while one of the hosts goes get a tissue from the kitchen the room is taken by a powerful sexual tension – from which no one will escape untouched.
title: Trivial
